channel.title: [*NEW*] UltimateScape is BACK!
channel.description:
[img]http://ultimatescape.net/forum/images/misc/vbulletin4_logo.png[/img][right][b]Useful Links[/b] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/home.png[/img][url=http://ultimatescape.net] Visit our Forums[/url] [img]http://facebok.com/favicon.ico[/img][url=https://www.facebook.com/pages/UltimateScape/168307646633813] Like us on Facebook[/url] [img]http://twitter.com/favicon.ico[/img][url=https://twitter.com/#!/UltimateScape] Follow us on Twitter[/url] [img]http://youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img][url=http://youtube.com/UltimateScapeServer] Visit our Channel[/url] [/right] UltimateScape is a new server based off BFMV's Azure which was based off Blakeman8192's RuneSource. My goal is to create a realistic, stable, lag free server with a stable economy and a moderate XP rate that people can enjoy, and unlike other private servers gain a sense of achievement if 99 in a skill is achieved if or a lot of money is obtained. I have tried to make this server as realistic as possible by using a lot of the resources available on RuneWiki for the combat, minigames and many of the skills.
[b]Legend[/b] Red - Not started Orange - In progress Green - Complete
[b][size=4]Updates[/size][/b]
[QUOTE] # Performance fixes # 1 connection/ip # Clipped firemaking # Combat rewrite # 7 new bosses # Added Hand Cannon # Added Dragon 2h # Magic Short Bow special # Added Dark Bow # Added NPC drop system # Fixed inaccurate weapon speeds # Added Dragon Claws # Added Magic Longbow # Added Korasi's Sword # Fixed 'x-logging' # Added Vesta's Spear # Rewrote NPC death method # Portals and NPC now respawn at Pest Control # Rewrote the Login Server # Player count updates on website # You can now specifiy a NPC's face direction # Added Morrigans Javelin # Fixed NPC HP bar # Added Morrigan's Thorowing Axe # The Ring of Recoil now degrades # Added all spirit shields # Fixed a major memory leak # Rewrote scripting system to be more efficient # Rewrote Runecrafting # Combat max hits are now accurate # Perfected shopping # Added Guthan's effect # All item requirements # Pest Control Shop # Updated Clan Chat # Duel Arena # Dicing [/QUOTE]
[b]Legend[/b] Red - Not started Orange - In progress Green - Complete

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [b][size=4]Skills[/size][/b]
[ul][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Cooking[/url] [list] [li]Use Range/Fire[/li] [li]Accurate burn formula[/li] [li]Cook 5, 10, All and X[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Construction [list] [li]Not [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20071125155039/runescape/images/c/cb/Miscellaneous_key.png[/img][size=14pt]Miscellaneous[/size]
[ul][li]Donation System[/li] [li]NPC Drops[/li] [li]Random Events[/li] [li]Multi-world support[/li] [li]Clipped following[/li] [li]Clan Chat[/li] [li]Dialogue's System[/li] [li]Punishment System[/li] [li]Accurate Item Prices (Dumped from Runewiki)[/li] [li]All equipment requirements and bonuses[/li][/ul] [SPOIL] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Misc/QuestTab.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Misc/ClanChat_1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/20739302/UltimateWorld%20Server/Misc/CrossWorld.png[/img] [right]
[b]The Team[/b] Ultimate (Myself) : Lead Developer Xseil : Client Developer Xynth : Graphics Designer
[b]Special Thanks To[/b] BFMV[/USER] : Azure Blakeman8192 : RuneSource Graham : Hyperion Sigex : Client [/right] [size=18pt]Expected date of BETA: 26/06/2012[/size] [b]What to expect in the BETA[/b]
In the BETA gameplay with be significantly easier for the purpose of testing, the pickup command will be enabled so you can test out all the weapons and armor and also the and leveling will be super quick. [b]Stats/items gained in the BETA will not be carried onto the main game![/b]
Don't forget to sign up to our website for special benefits in game! [size=12pt]http://ultimatescape.net[/size]

item.title: [*NEW*] UltimateScape is BACK!
item.dc:creator: @Rasta_Life Rasta Life
item.description:
@Rasta_Life wrote:

  • Boss Area Menu (select to fight bosses, if the clan owner selects a boss with clan 2nd option to join in, you do not lose items if you die while bossing, shop consist of bandos and armadyl armor, and 3rd age [ALL ECO FRIENDLY])

    34xpanq.jpg744×496

  • KQ, Chaos Ele, KBD

  • ALL GWD Bosses (they will drop GS all in one piece, sara does drop shards but are useless)

    348rfxl.jpg763×499

  • NEX AND CORP (nex drops torva, pernix, virtus… corp drops Spirit Shields and maybe chaotics, not too sure because it does require a team to kill)

  • Organized clan bossing (if you are in someones cc and they click the boss to fight and to fight with clan it will initiate a clan event!)

    2h8cv2f.jpg737×469

  • Organized clan bossing (60 second timer allowing everyone to join in time and shows clan and boss’s name!)

    oku73s.jpg764×476

-Bossing area (this is the area for ALL bosses, the screen will shake and the boss will spawn in the middle, ONCE YOU KILL A BOSS IT WILL NOT RESPAWN YOU WILL HAVE TO GO BACK TO BOSS SLAY TELE AND SET IT UP AGAIN)

2j639qx.jpg740×466

  • Tough luck with drops? (receive credits to use in credit store for killing bosses! as of now i believe all bosses give 1 cred except bandos)

    dmqk34.jpg726×466

  • CRED STORE (Use credits from skilling, bossing, minigames, to buy gear!)

    6z515t.jpg742×467

  • Donor Store (75% of the items can be obtained by all players, any rare or unobtainable item is expensive! ECO FRIENDLY)

    v665h5.jpg748×471

  • Interactive quest tab (clicking will QC your kills, deaths, etc. clicking on forums, vote, etc. will open up a new window for what your looking for!)

  • Tzhaar Store (THERE IS NO JAD ATM! The owner wanted to make it difficult to obtain a fire cape or kiln so that everyone isnt running around with it! each tzhaaar monster has a chance of dropping 1k-2k tokkul i believe)

    alhnx4.jpg753×479

  • Combat store has substores! (click what your looking for, it will take you to another menu where you select armor, weapons, or runes!)

    2u59umx.jpg741×468

  • Barrows (get a 6 KC by killing all brothers, no tunnels!)

    34pgi7n.jpg734×464

  • Obtaining Barrow Loot (once you’ve killed on brothers, simply dig into any hill and click investigate)

  • Barrow Loot! (as you see i got some runes and a credit)

    154esqx.jpg732×448

  • Highscores! (updates after you log, xp is very balanced! no maxed accounts yet!)

Read full topic

item.title: [*NEW*] UltimateScape is BACK!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatescape1 ultimatescape1
item.description:
@ultimatescape1 wrote:

[right]Useful Links
Visit our Forums
Like us on Facebook
Follow us on Twitter
Visit our Channel
[/right]
UltimateScape is a new server based off BFMV’s Azure which was based off Blakeman8192’s RuneSource. My goal is to create a realistic, stable, lag free server with a stable economy and a moderate XP rate that people can enjoy, and unlike other private servers gain a sense of achievement if 99 in a skill is achieved if or a lot of money is obtained. I have tried to make this server as realistic as possible by using a lot of the resources available on RuneWiki for the combat, minigames and many of the skills.

Legend
Red - Not started
Orange - In progress
Green - Complete

[size=4]Updates[/size]

Performance fixes

1 connection/ip

Clipped firemaking

Combat rewrite

7 new bosses

Added Hand Cannon

Added Dragon 2h

Magic Short Bow special

Added Dark Bow

Added NPC drop system

Fixed inaccurate weapon speeds

Added Dragon Claws

Added Magic Longbow

Added Korasi’s Sword

Fixed ‘x-logging’

Added Vesta’s Spear

Rewrote NPC death method

Portals and NPC now respawn at Pest Control

Rewrote the Login Server

Player count updates on website

You can now specifiy a NPC’s face direction

Added Morrigans Javelin

Fixed NPC HP bar

Added Morrigan’s Thorowing Axe

The Ring of Recoil now degrades

Added all spirit shields

Fixed a major memory leak

Rewrote scripting system to be more efficient

Rewrote Runecrafting

Combat max hits are now accurate

Perfected shopping

Added Guthan’s effect

All item requirements

Pest Control Shop

Updated Clan Chat

Duel Arena

Dicing

Legend
Red - Not started
Orange - In progress
Green - Complete

Graham : Hyperion
Sigex : Client
[/right]
[size=18pt]Expected date of BETA: 26/06/2012[/size]
What to expect in the BETA

In the BETA gameplay with be significantly easier for the purpose of testing, the pickup command will be enabled so you can test out all the weapons and armor and also the and leveling will be super quick. Stats/items gained in the BETA will not be carried onto the main game!

Don’t forget to sign up to our website for special benefits in game! [size=12pt]http://ultimatescape.net[/size]
